org.kaaproject.kaa.client.logging

Interface LogUploadConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLogUploadConfiguration

    public interface LogUploadConfiguration

    Interface for log upload configuration.

    Describes threshold values for upload strategy to decide whether logs should be sent or cleaned up.

    Reference implementation is (DefaultLogUploadConfiguration) and used by default (DefaultLogUploadStrategy).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getBatchVolume()
      Retrieves a maximum size of log batch sends to the Operation server.
      long getMaximumAllowedVolume()
      Maximum size of memory logs can occupy.
      long getVolumeThreshold()
      Retrieves a threshold value of memory occupied by added logs.

    • Method Detail

      • getBatchVolume

        long getBatchVolume()

        Retrieves a maximum size of log batch sends to the Operation server.

        NOTE: The upper bound is 32KB due a server limitations (DefaultLogUploadConfiguration.MAX_BATCH_VOLUME).

        Returns:
        Size in bytes.

      • getVolumeThreshold

        long getVolumeThreshold()
        Retrieves a threshold value of memory occupied by added logs. If this value is exceeded, log sending should be initiated.
        Returns:
        Size in bytes.

      • getMaximumAllowedVolume

        long getMaximumAllowedVolume()
        Maximum size of memory logs can occupy.
        Returns:
        Size in bytes.
